exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x : list (Term A n) c : canonical A0 eqA ltM x x0 : list (Term A n) c0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM x0 aL : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aL (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x0 x c0 c) (pO A n) Unable to unify "reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aL (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x0 x c0 c) (pO A n)" with "red (exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x x0 c c0) (spolyf_canonical A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os x x0 c c0)) aL".

original: intros. unfold red in H. unfold spolyp in H. simpl in H. unfold spolyp. simpl. destruct a, b. simpl in H. apply H.
